column4: Why isn't my internet connection working? I have run dhclient several times, but it won't reveive an IP.
What sort of a connection are you on?
Typically on reboot Ubuntu should automatically pick up an IP. Are you sure the other end of the cable is plugged in properly to a working DHCP server, like a router for example?
Actually DHCPD is not what you want . dhclient is what you want. anyway .. that apart..
